website_summaries.verdict: We love the vented back of this binocular harness, which makes it ideal for outdoor activities such as hunting or fishing.
pros: Sturdy and comfortable design make this harness comfortable to wear and easy to use
Harness keeps binoculars in a convenient position, especially for hunting or other similar activities
Vented back make this comfortable to wear, even in the heat
cons: Before first use, this harness tends to possess rubbery smell

customer_reviews.title: Works fine after repairs
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these, one for my mother and one for me, for a birding trip we were doing in Costa Rica. Right out of the box, I tried hooking up my binocular and one end had come undone. After a hike that weekend, the other set came undone as well. We were able to sew the straps back together and reinforce them so that the binoculars wouldn't fall off of their harnesses but it was a bit concerning and a little bit of a hassle that we had to repair a brand new product moments after using. After the repair they worked great, though they do get hot on your back after wearing them for a while.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Fast easy and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the product because of the ease it was to connect my binoculars to them. It fits perfect and is very comfortable. I was even able to connect my range finder. I would recommend this to anyone and or buy again if I need to
customer_reviews.author: Marc Logan

customer_reviews.title: Takes weight off neck, keeps glasses snug
customer_reviews.text: Amazon reviewers did not let me down. You can spend 10 times this for a sling, but these do exactly what I need. Simple, yet clever design, adjustable for a wide range of sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Wyrmwood

customer_reviews.title: Love 'em and you will too!
customer_reviews.text: Too many years I've gone with just clumsily hanging my binos around my neck while hunting. As a bowhunter, that is not the answer...so, I finally broke down and purchase this harness after reading reviews of all harness' which are available. I'm glad I went with these...not because of the cool Bone Collector logo on the back either! These are sturdy, easy to operate, and easy to use in the field, as well as, you hardly notice you're wearing a set of binoculars! They definitively take the load off of your neck and are easily worn from first light to darkness. Get a pair, you'll thank yourself after the first hour of use!!
customer_reviews.author: Skewtir

customer_reviews.title: A good Bino Strap
customer_reviews.text: I've used several of these for various binoculars. They perform well in their role. I have modified mine by carefully cutting away the external rubber advertising surface on the back. It is superfluous and can trap body heat. I've also added some quick hand stitching to keep the straps at my chosen adjustment length.
customer_reviews.author: anm108km

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: My old harness (different brand) broke the opening weekend of deer season. These did well holding my binos in place the rest of the season.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Plubell

customer_reviews.title: I recommend
customer_reviews.text: Looks good fits well good price thumbs up across the board
customer_reviews.author: frankie

customer_reviews.title: Great harness, but originally quite pungent.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great harness. However, do not take it out the night before you go hunting. It smells heavily of rubber that I could smell it on the counter in the kitchen a whole room over. Imagine how well a deer can smell it. I left it outside for a week in partial sunlight and sprayed it down with doe urine and it smells outdoor worthy now.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Slooter

customer_reviews.title: Great product for hunters who carry binoculars!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Use mine for deer hunting. Makes carrying and using your binoculars easy and comfortable when hunting.
customer_reviews.author: Morden Patterson

customer_reviews.title: deal
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it long but works great for the money
customer_reviews.author: Mary Browning

customer_reviews.title: Dependable
customer_reviews.text: Does what it is intended to do. Would buy again if I needed one!!
customer_reviews.author: GC Rocky Top

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the money
customer_reviews.text: I like them, they are a tad bit snug with my heavy jacket on, but I'm not a small guy either
customer_reviews.author: patrick curtis

customer_reviews.title: Stinks
customer_reviews.text: This harness when used for hunting stinks literally. The back area on it puts off a rubber smell that we couldn't get rid of. You can clearly smell it and so can the deer.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: One and done
customer_reviews.text: Hooked up my binoculars and went out scouting, the straps that attach to your binos came undone during the first trip in the field, the plastic broke. Having reconfigured with a metal ring, the rest of the unit seems to be holding up. Small plastic pieces to hold nice optics is not what I would expect from the Bone Collector name.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: A good price and fills the bill securing your binoculars toward ...
customer_reviews.text: A good price and fills the bill securing your binoculars toward you body. When turkey hunting I use my binos all of the time searching and waiting for them to come to decoy. Once you are ready to shoot, they are out of your way.
customer_reviews.author: Monman

customer_reviews.title: Exact same harness as the Bushnell, but $5. ...
customer_reviews.text: Exact same harness as the Bushnell, but $5.00 extra for the Bone Collector logo. Why pay extra for the name if you don't have to.
customer_reviews.author: Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good buy at $14. Wish they would put aluminum hardware or something more durable then the plastic clips you attach your $2500. Binoculars to
customer_reviews.author: Texas arrowheads

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice binocular caddy, they're excellent to say the least!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J

customer_reviews.title: these are awesome...
customer_reviews.text: The Bone Collector edition Bino Caddy is exactly what I was looking for. They fit great , priced right and hold my bino's with a strap and buckle rather than a little piece if string. I would recomend these to everyone.........
customer_reviews.author: crazedhunter

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: For the money, it doesn't get any better. I've owned high-end binocular straps and this is product holds up very nicely and is very comfortable. It is also very durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I'm a bowhunter and I was a bit a afraid to have my binos on my chest when I was drawing and releasing and when I used this caddy I never even noticed they where there. Also, it is a snap to grab them and glass. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: WesleyW

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable one I've tried. Can't go wrong with this
customer_reviews.author: Billy Mac

customer_reviews.title: So much more comfortable than a neck strap
customer_reviews.text: So much more comfortable than a neck strap. I use this strap with the bone collector 10x42 binos and also have a range finder clipped on and it works perfect.
customer_reviews.author: cdemarse

customer_reviews.title: This was for my wife
customer_reviews.text: This was for my wife, She says she likes it and it takes all the weight off her neck from the binos
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: OK harness. A bit larger than others I've used ...
customer_reviews.text: OK harness. A bit larger than others I've used but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Grey Feather

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Design, Fits Very Well. I'm 6'2" Tall, About 270lbs. And It Fits Me. Holds Binoculars Very Well To Body. Can't Wait To Use This Product For This Hunting Season.....
customer_reviews.author: JayH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my binoculars. I've taken this to hell and back while hunting and it's held up perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Golebiewski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I love the fitting style. Comfortable and was able to easily connect my binoculars. Vented backing works well when hiking. Adjustment simple and straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Just as described and so much more comfortable than the neck strap that most binoculars come with.
customer_reviews.author: AGander

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Keeps your binoculars high and tight and out of the way of your bow string.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Easy on and off. Very comfortable and no impediment to raising glasses.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dick

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Does exactly what they say it is supposed to do. comfortable and lightweight. Recommend highly
customer_reviews.author: Chris farrugia

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my wife she loves the support and the fit.
customer_reviews.author: J. Spires

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Good support, nice design, very comfortable. Good price. I look forward to using on my 4 day hunt this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: B. Felsher

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: great product. It is made well. and shipped fast. I plan on useing it for my compact bino's when I scout for hunting.
customer_reviews.author: ALLEN

customer_reviews.title: the camera or binoculars has plenty of leeway for easy use.
customer_reviews.text: This really distributes the weight of our camera or binoculars across our back rather than around our neck, Also, the camera or binoculars has plenty of leeway for easy use.
customer_reviews.author: Alice B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and so much better than the strap around your neck. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a good caddy, except it makes your back sweat a little more than other versions. Especially when the sun is beating down on the blackness.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Harness keeps the unbearable pain from your neck. Will purchase this again in the future, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: don't even know you're wearing it, as I did when I forgot to take it off (without binos attached) and got comments on it. easy to adjust, fits anyone and any type of optics you want to have quick access to.
customer_reviews.author: SCSaw2

customer_reviews.title: Me like
customer_reviews.text: Me like it! Great price, fits well, extremely easy to put on & take off. Comfortable for hunting elk in the Rockies! Or even great just for scenic adventures
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Albreski

customer_reviews.title: Bone collector harness was great
customer_reviews.text: The harness is very comfortable. I have serious back issues and With the harness I get hours of use with pain free enjoyment. Best Binocular harness I have used in the outdoors
customer_reviews.author: dt cleve

customer_reviews.title: EASY FIT AND COOL LOGO ON BACK
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised and big improvement on the strap that come with my new binocs. Plus ordering through Amazon Prime means I got it quick.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great item n super fast delivery. These are great bino system
customer_reviews.author: Richard Godwin

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I love my harness. Its very comfortable, I never have the weight of my binoculars on my neck and they are always where I need them.
customer_reviews.author: baby daddy 07

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and comfortable best bino caddy out their.
customer_reviews.text: The bino caddy is very comfortable and I would recommend it to anyone who would rather carry their binoculars around the neck instead of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Ginter

customer_reviews.title: buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from an elk hunt, strap was AWSOME! almost forgot that I had my binos hanging on me super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: manny

customer_reviews.title: hands free
customer_reviews.text: i own old school 10x50 tasco binoculars big &heavy,this harness is really well made and strong enough to hold up my old bino's.no more sore neck,bino's stay put right where you put them.it works great !!
customer_reviews.author: Steve O

customer_reviews.title: I would like to rate this higher but the clips don't fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I would like to rate this higher but the clips don't fit my binoculars and my binoculars are not an odd set . A little more thought could have gone into the design
customer_reviews.author: B. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Husband not very happy with product
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband to use with his Leopuld binoculars. He said it is too tight and he had a hard time hooking it to the binoculars.
customer_reviews.author: SmokeyMountainGirl

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I believe it will be OK, however I'm not sure the best way to attach the binoculars. I was hoping the straps would have snaps.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Arndt

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Clips don't actually fit binoculars and strap broke on first use. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: bone collector bino
customer_reviews.text: comfortable product. never wear binos around your neck again. This product streaches and moves with you well worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: ky

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put on and take off. Very adjustable, light weight and cool looking. I cant wait to bring them into the woods!
customer_reviews.author: BrandonLily

customer_reviews.title: Sent it back
customer_reviews.text: Cheap Chinese production. With a Butler Creek logo I expected more than this. Buy at your own risk. Buy American.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well. Nice and comfortable most of the time
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well. Nice and comfortable most of the time. If you are wearing for long periods of time it seems to slide up your back until its resting on your neck and you keep having to slide back down.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Elmore

product_meta.title: Butler Creek Bone Collector 16126 Deluxe Bino Harness Black Clam
product_meta.description: This flexible, supportive harness dramatically reduces perceived weight of you bingos via four elastic straps and our form fitting x panel. Zero weight on your neck. Supportive elastic straps. Downward pressure for stable viewing. Innovative form-fitting back panel. Easiest on and off.
feature_bullets: Innovative form-fitting back panel; supportive elastic straps
Back panel emblazoned with Bone Collector logo
